column4: I've noticed that Linux has lost a lot of it's command line roots and switched over to the more GUIy (read: gooey) side of things. Probably from all the Windows users fed up with Windows.
new users find it less intimidating to get hints and prompts from a gui rather than a bare command line
dapper should detect the windows partition - but you should probably have a backup just to be safe :)
It's a fresh install. Nothing added yet. Not even drivers.'
